The Course | GOLF | Welcome to The Club... the best in class - Club Adena Skip to Main Content HOME GOLF The Course The Clubhouse Membership Pro Shop CLUBS ENTERTAIN EQUESTRIAN Stables POLO Watch THE RESIDENCES FUTURE CLUB AMENITIES ADENA VITA CONNECT REGISTER "Dramatic and unforgettable" GOLF DIGEST BOOK A TEE TIME SCORE CARD An Unparalleled Golfing Experience C lub Adena offers avid golfers and professionals alike, a unique experience while on this expansive 18 hole course. Like no other course in Ocala, enjoy vistas beyond compare and elevations that transport golfers to another level making for an unforgettable challenge. GOLF MEMBERSHIP Elevate your golfing experience to new heights with Club Adena's Exclusive Golf membership! Learn More by connecting with our team and join a community of passionate golf enthusiasts who appreciate the perfect blend of challenge, luxury and camaraderie. WOMEN’S LEAGUE Club Adena is proud to present an exclusive league for all members at the Club who have a passion for golf. With curated programming and flexible schedules, female members can enjoy exclusive access to seasoned professionals and shine on the course! TOURNAMENT TYPES: MEN’S WOMEN’S JUNIOR CORPORATE CHARITY TOURNAMENTS Interested to know more? Reach out to our membership team for all scheduled tournaments at the club and learn how you can participate. LEARN MORE SUBMIT REGISTER TO STAY CONNECTED Sign up for Membership info and to be among the first to receive updates and invitations. Welcome to The Club... the best in class - Club Adena Skip to Main Content HOME GOLF The Course The Clubhouse Membership Pro Shop CLUBS ENTERTAIN EQUESTRIAN Stables POLO Watch THE RESIDENCES FUTURE CLUB AMENITIES ADENA VITA CONNECT REGISTER Welcome to The Club, the best in class Welcome to Club Adena, where world class amenities redefine the art of living. Tee Off on our pristine 18 hole golf course, designed to challenge and captivate enthusiasts of the sport. Savor an exquisite farm-to-table dining experience that elevate your plate with each delectable bite, setting a new standard of culinary excellence. EXPLORE THE COURSE Previous Next A Club of Luxury and Distinction Dive into a world of racquets and rallies as we  introduce the latest sports sensation at our club-tennis and pickleball! Elevate your game and embrace the thrill of the court as we bring you two exciting additions to our roster of activities. Elevate your lifestyle at Club Adena The perfect destination. The ultimate membership. Savour the ultimate in luxury with 5-star services and amenities at one club. Enjoy premium services including a world renowned health facility that includes access to industry health care technologies, exclusive to members at Club Adena. LEARN MORE PLAY ENTERTAIN WELLNESS SUBMIT REGISTER TO STAY CONNECTED Sign up for Membership info and to be among the first to receive updates and invitations. YOUNG EXECUTIVE GOLF MEMBERSHIP Members under 40 years of age will enjoy the use of all facilities at Club Adena including the following: Spa and Swimming Pool Tennis & Pickleball Courts Lounge Bar Dining Room 18 Hole Golf Course SOCIAL MEMBERSHIP Members will enjoy all amenities on the property including: Spa and Swimming Pool Tennis & Pickleball Courts Lounge Bar Dining Room CORPORATE GOLF MEMBERSHIP Corporate memberships will be entitled to an allowance of up to four title members and will enjoy the use of the following amenities Spa and Swimming Pool Tennis & Pickleball Courts Lounge Bar Dining Room NATIONAL GOLF MEMBERSHIP National membership must live 75 miles from the club and will enjoy the use of the following amenities Spa and Swimming Pool Tennis & Pickleball Courts Lounge Bar Dining Room SUBMIT REGISTER TO STAY CONNECTED Sign up for Membership info and to be among the first to receive updates and invitations. Leadership Team | Adena Development Skip to content Formerly Springfield Properties, LLC 1310 W. Fourth St. 419-529-4424 help@adenadev.com About Us Leadership Team Our Services Portfolio Projects News Adena Development Leadership Adena Development is a family-owned business that understands what is important from an owner’s perspective.  We partner with our clients and guide them through the development process to accomplish their goals.  Our approach is to support each client in the way they need, while bringing ideas and perspective to the table which are thought provoking and value minded.  Our ability to assist in all aspects including acquisition, financing, design, rehab, construction, and sale, helps make our clients’ vision a reality. Our Leadership Randy Payne Co-Founder of Adena Development & President of Adena Corporation 32 years of experience in the construction industry Bachelor of Engineering, Construction Management Randy began his career with Adena Corporation in 1988 as an estimator, just thirteen short years later he became president, and then the sole owner. Adena Corporation has long been known as a trusted, elite construction management and general construction firm.  Randy recognized the value of self-perform work and the need to provide jobs for the local area.  Therefore over the years, Adena Corporation with Randy’s leadership has added and grown business divisions that perform concrete, masonry, carpentry, steel erection and fabrication. The Adena brand implements approximately $150MM worth of construction annually and employees over 400 team members.  In 2014, Randy co-founded the development entity to support the local real estate market and strengthen his diverse business model.  Despite rapid growth, Randy’s values remain the same – relationships, quality craftsmanship, individualized service and community partnerships. Randy’s devotion, hard work, and passion toward the construction industry and real estate development have led to their many successes. Jim Schmidt Co-Founder of Adena Development, CEO of MKC Architects & President of University Housing Solutions 35 years of experience in the architecture and real estate industry Bachelor of Science in Architecture Jim joined MKC Architects in 1983 and is firm Principal and CEO. Jim has performed design work on numerous civic and education projects throughout his career, with a specialty in designing inspirational spaces. Jim has focused his expertise in project master planning, conceptual design and the development of innovative and cost effective architectural designs. Jim spends his time focusing on private-led development, in particular student housing. His role is to ensure the development of the design is consistent with the owner’s expectations and to create integrity centered, innovative designs. Jim’s involvement in many local and state board of directors has given him the opportunity to inform others about the practice of architecture and its effects on people, places and cultures. The combined experience and expertise of Adena Development’s founders is like no other! Our Staff Ryan Payne ● Construction Project Manager ryan.payne@adenadev.com 419-529-4456 ext. 292 Meghan Schmidt ● Director of Development m.schmidt@adenadev.com 419-989-5639 MacKenize Cass ● Acquisition & Leasing Director m.cass@adenadev.com 419-529-4424 Matthew Garrison ● Property Manager m.garrison@adenadev.com 419-610-4330 Matthew Cotter ● Assistant Property Manager m.cotter@adenadev.com 567-560-7540 419-529-4424 1310 W. Fourth St. Mansfield, OH 44906 © 2020 Adena Development

If you arrive early, consider viewing some of the Equestrian Exhibitions and/or Show Competitions that may be happening Sunday afternoon. 5:30pm Welcome Cocktail Reception(Open Bar) followed by Welcome Dinner in a Private Dining Room at the World Equestrian Center (Casual Attire). Monday, March 3, 2025: 6:30am Breakfast service begins in Stirrups Restaurant at the nearby Equestrian Hotel. Golf is scheduled this morning off property at Golden Ocala Golf and Equestrian Club located about 6 minutes away, driving from the WEC. Please arrive at least 30 minutes before your tee time so you'll have time to get ready prior to your tee time. 10:00am Tee Times begin. Today's round is a 2 best of 4 team competition. No planned dinner tonight, you might consider one of the restaurants on the WEC campus or nearby in Ocala. Tuesday, March 4, 2025: 6:30am Breakfast service begins in Stirrups Restaurant at the nearby Equestrian Hotel. Golf is scheduled this morning off property at Club Adena Golf Course located about 20 minutes driving from the WEC. Please arrive at least 30 minutes before your tee time so you'll have time to get ready prior to your tee time. 10:00am Tee Times begin. Today's round is a 2 best of 4 team competition. 5:30pm Cocktail Reception(Open Bar) followed by Awards Dinner in a Private Dining Room at the World Equestrian Center (Casual Attire). Wednesday, March 5, 2025: 6:30am Breakfast service begins in Stirrups Restaurant at the nearby Equestrian Hotel. 11:00am Hotel check out time. Have a safe trip home and thanks for joining us in Ocala at the World Equestrian Center! Many of our SFGA Members may be familiar with the sleepy town of Ocala as you've no doubt driven right by it while traveling north or south on I75. We are always searching for new venues and believe we've found a reason to exit I75 in Ocala! Join us at one of Florida's trendiest new resorts, the World Equestrian Center.  This $800 Million Dollar Equestrian Centric Resort is a mecca for the Equestrian community and it should be since its the largest equine facility in the U.S.  The World Equestrian Center's 388 acre facilities were designed with the ultimate comfort of the horse, rider, and spectators in mind. Facilities include Two Exposition Centers, a state-of-the-art Equestrian Competition Venue offering six climate-controlled indoor arenas and 23 cutting-edge, outdoor arenas, and Stabling to accommodate nearly 3,000 horses. Show grounds are multidisciplinary meaning they can host - Hunt and Jump, Dressage, and Breed shows, making this facility incredibly unique. You may be asking yourself, what about accommodations for people? The WEC has you covered in grand style! In 2021 they opened the luxurious 248 room Equestrian Hotel and on April 1, 2024 they opened the upscale 390 room Riding Academy Hotel. Our group will stay in the new Riding Academy Hotel's spacious King Studios. Other resort amenities include, seven restaurants (including a horse-shaped bar in the Yellow Pony Pub), a wine program curated by an in-house master sommelier, a 7,000 sqft. Spa, two swimming pools and high-end Retail Shops such as Lugano Diamonds. Our golf will take place at two of Ocala's best private Country Club's. Golden Ocala Golf & Equestrian Club, a Ron Garl design with several interesting tribute holes to St. Andrews, Augusta National, Royal Troon and more. We'll also play the recently opened Club Adena - featuring elevation changes, limestone-quarry lakes, rugged rock faces, and Spanish moss-draped oak trees.  We only have space for 28 golfers and encourage our members to register for this event before it sells out! The World Equestrian Center plays host to a vast array of multipurpose meetings, conventions and events that draw thousands of visitors, guests can see everything from dog shows, car shows, comic cons, home and garden expos and so much more while staying at WEC. The World Equestrian Center Events Schedule has not been updated to include March 2025. However on Sunday March 3, 2024 they hosted the Equestrian National Grand Prix, the Ocala Boat Show and and Equestrian International Show Jumping Competition. We will email all our participants the WEC Events during our stay once they are published. Three nights at the World Equestrian Center's brand new Riding Academy Hotel in a comfortable King Studio Room. Breakfast each morning in the World Equestrian Center's Stirrup's Restaurant. Welcome Reception (open bar) followed by Group Dinner on our first night (March 2, 2025) Awards Reception (open bar) followed by Group Dinner on our last night (March 4, 2025) Two Rounds of Golf with Carts and Practice Range Balls Prior to each round. Golf will be played at: Golden Ocala Golf and Equestrian Club - A Ron Garl design with several tribute holes paying homage to St. Andrews, Royal Troon & Augusta National. Club Adena Golf Course - Ocala's newest private club. Two tournament rounds where the formats are: 2 Best of 4 and Odds & Even, four person team play. Tournament entry fees are included in your package price. Prizes will be awarded. The resort fee is included and provides internet access via Wifi, fitness center access, self-parking, swimming pool and more. Gratuities on planned meals, Taxes and Resort fees are included. We'll stay at The Riding Academy Hotel in Ocala, Florida—the newest, 390-room addition to the impressive campus of World Equestrian Center, the largest equestrian competition venue in the United States.A seamless blend of superior comfort and equestrian charm, The Riding Academy Hotel offers upscale, pet-friendly accommodations and authentic hospitality in the heart of horse country. Our participants will stay in King Studio guest rooms featuring upscale furnishings with desirable in-room amenities, such as coffee makers and Sub-Zero refrigerators, 65 inch TVs and pull-out sleeper sofas. Unique artwork charms and delights, while thoughtful touches and luxurious finishes provide guests with all the warmth and comfort of home. Amenities include the a Shuttle Service around the World Equestrian Center's expansive campus, complimentary Self-parking, Seven Restaurants on property - choose from fast casual to fine dining, Pool and Outdoor Sundeck, Fitness Center and High Speed Wifi. GOLDEN OCALA GOLF AND EQUESTRIAN CLUB ​ Golden Ocala Golf & Equestrian Club boasts a well maintained 18-hole championship private course designed by golf course architect Ron Garl. The majestic course at Golden Ocala incorporates eight masterfully recreated tribute holes from some of the world’s finest golf courses including: Augusta National Golf Club (Home of the Masters Tournament), Augusta, GA, USA Royal Troon Golf Club, Scotland Baltusrol Golf Club, Springfield, NJ, USA Muirfield Village Golf Club, Scotland St. Andrews Links, Scotland During 2015 and 2016, Golden Ocala Golf & Equestrian Club hosted the Coates Golf Championship, an official LPGA Tour event that featured 120 of the top female golfers in the world. Na Yeon Choi shot 16 under par and won the event in 2015 by one shot over Lydia Ko, Ha Na Jang and Jessica Korda. In 2016 South Korean Ha Na Jang finished at 11 under par and won beating Brooke Henderson by two shots.          It's always a fun course to play and we think our members will love it! Club Adena The Golf Courses: Golden Ocala Golf and Equestrian Club Our Hotel: CLICK HERE TO REGISTER WORLD EQUESTRIAN CENTER, CLUB ADENA & GOLDEN OCALA COUNTRY CLUB A) $1,995 Per Person Per Golfer, Double Occupancy or $3,990 Per Couple both Golfing B) $1,495 Per Non-Golfer, Double Occupancy or $3,490 Per Couple, Golfer & Non-Golfer C) $2,495 Per Golfer Single Occupancy D) $440 Extra Night - King Studio Room, State and Local Taxes, Breakfast in Stirrups Restaurant Golden Ocala Golf and Equestrian Club CLUB ADENA ​ Club Adena formerly known as Adena Golf & Country Club has recently reopened. The club was created by Frank Stronach who made his fortune in the automobile parts industry and founded the $35 billion automotive parts supplier Magna International, a Canadian behemoth. Stronach, diversified his wealth and became a breeder of thoroughbred horses, owner of multiple racetracks, such as Santa Anita in California and Gulfstream Park in Florida and owner of cattle and horse farms in Canada and Central Florida and Ocala. His love of thoroughbred horses is what brought him to Ocala and eventually his developement of Club Adena - a premium, members-only, full service club.  Shortly after it opened in 2015, the golf course was recognized by "Golf Digest" as one of the Best New Courses in America. But in the summer of 2018, the club abruptly closed because of a family disagreement that resulted in years of legal proceedings. The litagation has ended and now Club Adena is part of a high-end residential development featuring an exclusive private golf course that the SFGA will play. The 18-hole golf course was built around limerock mining quarries that provide up to 80 feet of elevation change from tee to green on some holes. A feature of the property are waterfalls which feed into lake quarries of blue water and provide a dramatic backdrop on multiple holes. Moss draped live oaks provide tranquil scenery and line the well-groomed fairways and greens.  Be sure to bring your camera. About Us - Adena Coffee Menu About Us Our Beans Boutique Speciality Commercial Coffee Origin Sumatera Flores Bali Our Impact Contact info@adenacoffee.com Instagram Linkedin We provide meaningful coffee that promotes livelihood and sustainability Our Story From a humble, yet meaningful beginning Adena coffee has a fascinating origin story as a community initiative that aimed to provide a new collective memory for a former conflict area through the shared love of people, nature, culture, and coffee. Initially conceived as a passion project within the community, Adena grew from a small endeavour into a full-fledged business. Our commitment to quality community, and the cultural significance of coffee has allowed us to thrive and expand beyond our humble beginnings. The word “Adena” holds special significance for the company, as it is derived from one of Indonesian local languages – Kaimana, where it means “mother”. This choice of name refletcs the nurturing and community-centric ethos that Adena ambodies. Adena truly believes that coffee can not ever seperated from the people who produce it. Our goal isn’t just about coffee, it’s about connection. Just as coffee sparks conversations. Adena believes in fostering dialogues that matter. Our team is your confidents, your companian on this journey of conscious consumption. Our Approach Empowering community & bringing the truest Indonesian coffee to the world Developing origins by implementing sustainable, transparent & traceable coffee through agroforestry & best practice in post-harvest technology. Opening-up more proccessing units in Indonesia by partnering with the local communities and enhancing their production capability. Going global and representing Indonesia through high-quality, meaningful and sustainable coffee. Our Values A Brew of Empathy Inspired by the vibrant people, the nature & the culture of the motherland, we're rewriting the narrative of coffee processing with a dash of style and a whole lot of heart, nurturing a movement that ripples through communities and ecosystems. It's a commitment to a world where coffee is a catalyst for change by championing fair wages, empowering local talents, and endorsing sustainable farming practices. Origin Renaissance Adena celebrates the artistry of life, as we celebrate the craft of coffee-processing. We're processing our beans like they're art, coaxing out distinct flavours and aromas from every origin, experimentally. Blending bespoke technology and locally sourced wisdoms, we process our coffee like a caffeinated cosmos that is way more than just a buzz. The Bean Odyssey Traverse our origins, take a journey across mountains, jungles, and realms unknown, in pursuit of the perfect bean. Adena is about experiencing the heartbeat of coffee farms, where coffee isn't just a beverage; it's a revolution wrapped in a cup, a kaleidoscope of culture, conscience. We source our beans from dedicated farmers who toil the fertile lands with respect for nature. Shaking hands with the guardians of our land? Yeah, that's our jam. From Beans to Your Embrace Our beans are harvested with the same love your mom puts into her garden, ensuring a taste that's both familiar and extraordinary. We roast (& blend?) these beans with that magical ingredient called nostalgia. Our recipes are a whisper from generations past, an ode to the cosy kitchens where love and coffee percolated together. Here's to every mom who brewed love into every cup, and here's to the coffee that feels like coming home. Our Services Ethical Sourcing and Fair Trade Practices We cultivate strong partnerships with coffee farmers, ensuring they receive fair compensation for their high-quality beans. We actively support knowledge-sharing workshops, empowering farmers with sustainable farming practices and fostering a collaborative environment. Market Customisation Focusing on customer needs by customising our green beans offering based on the cupping profile target that includes : The cupping profile target The end product (e.g. for espresso blend, competitions, filter, and others Calculation of the expected shipment time and approximate volume Adena internal assessment on the cupping profile based on different process, origins and ease of production in timely manner Compilation of above in a buyer’s recommendation proposal. Quality Control Beyond End-Product We do more than only “quality control”. We do continuous improvement to bring the best quality coffee to you. We do quality check on each stages: new harvest, offer samples, pre shipment samples, arrival samples Quality checks on green beans physical analysis and its sensory evaluation according to CQI standard. Analysis that we check are: Color Odor Screen Size Moisture % Defect Counts Triage % Density Innovation & Experimental Processing Focus on innovative post-processing methods. We seek new methods of fermentation and drying to achieve unique cupping characteristics. Impact Documentation on Every Origin We continuously deliver and measure our impact to the origins. Leadership Team Abyatar Founder  & CEO Bayu Winata Co-Founder & CFO Joseph Juan Co-Founder & COO Gonzaga Business Head From local to global. We have been trusted by top leading brands accross global. Every Sip Uplifts, Every Bean Tells a Story. About Adena Our Product Coffee Origin Our Impact Contact Have a question in mind? CONTACT US © 2024 • Adenacoffee
